Names.en: {1} annual evapotranspiration in the [T-T] period for model output {2}
Names.hu: Éves evapotranszspiráció {1} a(z) [T-T] időszakban a(z) {2} modelleredmény alapján

query: SELECT plotid,{1}(cEVTR) FROM (SELECT MAX(cumevtr) AS cEVTR, plotid, year FROM {2} WHERE year >= [T1] AND year <= [T2] GROUP BY year, plotid) GROUP BY plotid;
